text: Extraordinary, custom-built 4-bedroom, 3.5-bath modern home on Molasses Creek in Hobcaw Point. Home was expertly and artfully designed by MIT and Clemson-trained architect, Ken Huggins, to emphasize indoor/outdoor living that blends discreetly into the landscape. As you approach the front entrance, note the subtle privacy screen that helps define a small courtyard and covered stoop. Enter the foyer where a large window opposite the glass front door reveals spherical fountains in an oak wrapped vestibule bound by the continuation of the privacy screen along the front of the house. The foyer's wood-covered ceiling and back wall find synergy with the outdoor scenery. To the right of the foyer, you'll enter the open concept great room and kitchen with high ceilings and a wall of windowsthat invite abundant natural light and overlook the picturesque backyard. The great room includes a dining area with built-in banquette seating and storage drawers, and it is separated from the eat-in kitchen by a sleek double-sided gas fireplace with Venetian plaster surround. The kitchen features a large island with breakfast bar, tons of storage within the mid-century modern walnut wood cabinetry, refrigerator and dishwasher panels that match the cabinetry, quartzite countertops, double wall convection ovens, induction cooktop, two pantry closets with pullout shelves, and a prep sink and cleanup sink (both with disposals). Beyond the kitchen, on the right side of the house, is a den/common area shared by two bedrooms with a Jack-and-Jill bath. From the den you'll enter the spacious primary suite with loft. This area projects off the den to the rear, creating the home's L-shape and maximizing backyard, patio, pool, and creek views. The primary bedroom features columns of stacked floor-to-ceiling two-story windows, which flood the space with natural light, and spiral stairs that lead to the loft. A grasscloth-covered accent wall separates the bedroom from the bathroom. The primary bathroom has a double-sink mid-century modern vanity; extra large undermount soaking tub; frameless glass shower; and water closet. A sliding glass door leads from the primary suite to the sprawling travertine-paved patio and custom heated saltwater pool and spa with automatic cover. The guest powder room with custom steel vanity and tile walls can be accessed from the patio as well as from inside the house. On the opposite end of the house is a serene guest suite (bedroom and en suite bath) that overlooks the backyard and has its own patio entrance. The patio is covered along the rear of the home, and the cabana off the shed offers additional covered outdoor living space. The backyard extends beyond the patio to the tidal creek and features custom Corten steel raised bed gardens with irrigation, a gas fire pit, and a dock with floater. The creek, which is navigable from the dock within three hours on either side of high tide, meets the Wando and Cooper Rivers near their junction point. The attached carport provides covered entry to the home's mud room off the kitchen and has a level-2 EV charging station. A gas generator provides power to the whole house in the event of a power outage. The abundance of live oaks and other native evergreen trees and shrubs on the property were the foundational elements for landscape architect firm Surculus Design to create a sustainable habitat for wildlife, birds, and native pollinators. Numerous fruit trees were added (loquat, plum, pear, grapefruit, orange, and fig) along with beds of native perennial flowering plants and a perfect Gingko tree out front. The current homeowners spared no expense in the design and build of this home. Must see to appreciate the many fine details!

text: Welcome to 4310 Stonehouse Circle, a spectacularly unique low country home built in the exclusive gated private community of Bulls Bay Golf Club. The custom-built bookshelves are backed in pecky cypress, giving this den a cozy feel. One of the neatest features of this home is that all the living areas and bedrooms have a view of the pool, where mature palm trees are automatically lit at dusk. text: LAKEFRONT Townhome in HAMLIN Plantation - This beautifully maintained 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath home offers uninterrupted LAKE VIEWS and stylish living in one of Mount Pleasant's most sought-after communities. One of only four duplexes situated along Hamlin Plantation's largest lake, this 2, 172 sq ft home is surrounded by natural beauty, where bald eagles, ospreys, herons, and other coastal wildlife are frequent visitors.A full exterior RENOVATION in 2021 brought new Hardie Plank siding, trim, gutters, Pella windows, and an architectural shingled roof, all complimented by the coastal color palette. Inside, you're immediately drawn to the breathtaking LAKE VIEWS, visible from the OPEN CONCEPT living space. A wall of windows across the back of the home fills the interior with NATURAL LIGHT andcreates a stunning focal point in the kitchen, dining, and living areas. These windows are also equipped with an ELECTRIC BLIND, offering effortless light control and privacy at the touch of a button. The main living area features HARDWOOD floors, a ship lapped gas FIREPLACE, CUSTOM white oak mantle, BUILT-IN shelving, and ACCENT lighting blending seamlessly with the tranquil surroundings. Step outside to the SCREENED porch and expansive TABBY CONCRETE patio, complete with a FIREPIT and PRIVACY WALL. Whether you're enjoying a quiet morning coffee while watching the SUNRISE or entertaining friends by the fire, this outdoor space offers a peaceful retreat. Upstairs, the PRIMARY suite offers stunning lake views, a tray ceiling, and a flexible space ideal for a seating area, home office, or workout nook. The SPA-INSPIRED en suite bath features an oversized soaking tub, glass-walled shower, granite-topped dual vanities, a private water closet, and dual walk-in closets for optimal storage. The kitchen is both functional and stylish, with GRANITE countertops, a tile BACKSPLASH, STAINLESS steel appliances, BAR SEATING, and a WALK-IN PANTRY with ample storage. Two secondary bedrooms are located at the front of the home and share a beautifully updated hall bath with one bedroom offering PRIVATE access, making it ideal for guests or family. A RARE FIND in townhome living, this property offers GROUND-LEVEL entry, allowing seamless access to the main living space without the need for stairs. Additional highlights include a second-floor LAUNDRY ROOM complete with washer, dryer, storage cabinets, and hanging rods, as well as a spacious TWO-CAR GARAGE with plenty of room for a vehicle, golf cart, or motorcycle, plus ceiling-mounted storage racks for added organization.
